mapper.select: SELECT * FROM DEPT WHERE DNAME LIKE '%'||#{DNAME}||'%' AND LOC LIKE '%'||${LOC}||'%'
SELECT empno, ename, sal, grade FROM emp, salgrade WHERE sal BETWEEN losal AND hisal AND sal>=#{sal}
SELECT empno, ename, job, sal FROM EMP e WHERE (sal ge #{start} AND sal le #{end}) OR job = #{job}
SELECT ename, loc, to_char(hiredate, 'Q') part FROM emp e, dept d WHERE e.deptno = d.deptno AND to_char(hiredate, 'Q') IN (#{p01},#{p02})
select e.empno, e.ename, d.dname, e.sal from emp e, dept d where e.deptno = d.deptno and deptno = #{deptno}
select e.ename from emp e, emp m where e.mgr = m.empno and m.ename = #{ename}
select max(sal) from emp where ename in (#enames[0], #enames[1], #enames[2])
